snippet: Trapped while on a field trip, 85 schoolchildren and their chaperones were among the hundreds of people evacuated by helicopter this weekend amid severe flooding.
abstract: Trapped while on a field trip, 85 schoolchildren and their chaperones were among the hundreds of people evacuated by helicopter this weekend amid severe flooding.

headline.main: Video of Helicopter Rescue Crews Airlifting 85 Schoolchildren to Safety
